parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Valid values: 1 to 1000.

Default value: 20.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   If **NextToken** is empty, no next page exists.
*   If a value of **NextToken** is returned, the value indicates the token that is used for the next query.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the instance belongs.

parameters.name: ServerGroupIds
parameters.description:
The server group IDs.

You can specify at most 20 server group IDs in each call.

parameters.name: ServerGroupNames
parameters.description:
The server group names.

You can specify at most 20 server group names in each call.

parameters.name: ServerGroupType
parameters.description:
The server group type. Valid values:

*   **Instance**: allows you to specify resources of the **Ecs**, **Eni**, or **Eci** type.
*   **Ip**: allows you to add servers by specifying IP addresses.

parameters.name: Skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to be skipped in the call.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description:
The tag keys.

You can specify at most 20 tags in each call.
